title: Booksmart
creator_credit: Annapurna Pictures, Gloria Sanchez Productions, Katie Silberman, Olivia Wilde, Chelsea Barnard, Emily Halpern, Sarah Haskins, Susanna Fogel, Katie Byron, Megan Ellison, David Distenfeld and April Napier
brief_description: Two academic teenage superstars realize, on the eve of their high school graduation, that they should have worked less and played more. Determined to never fall short of their peers, the girls set out on a mission to cram four years of fun into one night.

constellations_other.name: Bell & Howell Projector 621: This picture has been edited for content
constellations_other.description: The Bell & Howell-Gaumont Model 621 projector was originally used entertain the shearers on a sheep farm in South Australia with the films screened sometimes edited for distribution.
